definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be low, humiliated (Aram. [[מְכַח]], mak; Ar. mak=a is suck entirely out, diminish, consume)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִמַּח]] Ec 10:18 sink (in decay) of house-timbers.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהֻמְּכוּ]] Job 24:24 be brought low, of wicked.
